report.title: Report for temporary report testing
report.description: Report that other reports can be copied into for testing before go live. This allows reports to be checked without risking breakage of the live report. After testing, the report can be copied to the live version. Current test report is for ukbms_occurrence_download_confidential.xml
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN samples parent ON parent.id = o.parent_sample_id JOIN samples child ON child.id = o.sample_id JOIN locations l2 ON child.location_id=l2.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# WHERE #website_filter# #location_list# #filters# #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.parent_sample_id as sample_id, o.id as occurrence_id, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, l2.code as section_name, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, cttl.preferred_taxon as preferred

order_bys.order_by: parent.location_id, parent.date_start, l2.code, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: year
param.where: o.date_end >= CAST('#year#-01-01' as date) AND o.date_start <= CAST('#year#-12-31' as date)

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the taxon list to show

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: smp2attrs
param.description: Comma separated list of section sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Comma separated list of location IDs
